entry.title: June Galactic News!
entry.content: The June 2021 Newsletter is here. GCC2021 starts this month; James Taylor Video; plus a whole lot more.
entry.summary: The June 2021 Newsletter is here. GCC2021 starts this month; James Taylor Video; plus a whole lot more.

entry.title: 2021 Galaxy Community Conference (GCC2021) - Early registration closes 8th June

link.title: 2021 Galaxy Community Conference (GCC2021) - Early registration closes 8th June

entry.content:
The 2021 Galaxy Community Conference is almost upon us. GCC2021 will be held 28 June through July 10.

June 8: Early registration closes

Register by June 8 and save 50% off of the full rates. Registration discounts are available to researchers from low and lower-middle income countries. For everyone else, registration is downright cheap too, starting at €15.00 for the training week and in €25.00 for the 3-day conference (plus VAT). The CoFest is free.
entry.summary: The 2021 Galaxy Community Conference is almost upon us. GCC2021 will be held 28 June through July 10.

entry.title: 2021 Galaxy Community Conference (GCC2021) - Poster/Demo abstracts due 14th June

link.title: 2021 Galaxy Community Conference (GCC2021) - Poster/Demo abstracts due 14th June

entry.content:
The 2021 Galaxy Community Conference is almost upon us. GCC2021 will be held 28 June through July 10.

June 14: Poster Abstracts are due

We welcome poster/demo submissions that use, implement or extend the Galaxy platform and ecosystem, including integrating and analyzing datasets in any research area, enhancing reproducibility in computational analyses, and fostering collaboration in scientific workflow development

Poster/Demos will be presented live at Remo.co tables and will not be limited to a single large PDF. They are an opportunity to fully communicate your work.

Submit your abstract now.
entry.summary: The 2021 Galaxy Community Conference is almost upon us. GCC2021 will be held 28 June through July 10.

entry.title: May Galactic News!
entry.content: The May 2021 Newsletter is here. Deadlines for GCC2021 and for submitted James Taylor videos have been extended, and there are updates on other upcoming events (4 in Australia), news about public Galaxy platforms, recent blog posts, training and doc updates, recent open-access Galaxy-related publications, and new releases.
entry.summary: The May 2021 Newsletter is here. Deadlines for GCC2021 and for submitted James Taylor videos have been extended, and there are updates on other upcoming events (4 in Australia), news about public Galaxy platforms, recent blog posts, training and doc updates, recent open-access Galaxy-related publications, and new releases.

entry.content: Several deadlines for the 2021 Galaxy Community Conference (GCC2021) have been extended.
